name: Arkan Infinity - Working Prototype
description: Runtime metadata and run instructions for the Arkan Infinity Streamlit prototype.
run_instructions: Create and activate a virtual environment: python -m venv .venv && & '.\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1'
Install dependencies: pip install -r requirements.txt or pip install streamlit opencv-python mediapipe groq pillow requests numpy

Configure Groq API key: add config.toml with [api]
key = "your_groq_api_key_here" OR set env var GROQ_API_KEY
Start the app: & '.\.venv\Scripts\python.exe' -m streamlit run userInterface.py
Open browser at the URL printed by Streamlit (e.g., http://localhost:8501)
notes: If your installed MediaPipe variant does not expose mp.solutions, the Camera Translation feature will show a message and be disabled until MediaPipe is switched or the app is adapted to use MediaPipe Tasks. Keep config.toml in .gitignore to avoid committing secrets.
